== Amballur (CT) (628019) ==

Amballur (CT) is a town in the [[Kanayannur]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 10.82 sq. km. and harbouring 2801 households with total population of 11358 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 20 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 210 km. Male population is 5537 and female population is 5821. Scheduled Caste population is 1157 and Scheduled Tribes population is 23. Census Location Code of the town is 628019<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 20 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 20 km. Railway station is at Kanjiramattom at a distance of 2 km.
